text: The Palace of Villena () is a palace in Cadalso de los Vidrios, Spain. It was built by Álvaro de Luna, Duke of Trujillo. The building and the gardens are listed as a Spanish Property of Cultural Interest. The building is listed as a monument. It has been protected since 1931. The gardens are listed as a jardín histórico (historic garden). They have been protected since the 1970s. == References == Villena Category:Community of Madrid
title: Palacio de Villena (Cadalso de los Vidrios)
